testcase.name: Create ResourceGraph
testcase.system-out: @ResourceGraph Scenario: Create ResourceGraph # src/test/resources/features/01_resource_graph.feature:7 Resource JSON: { "resourceId": "Karan Kapoor" } Given I have a ResourceID # social_comments.ResourceGraph.i_have_a_resourceid() Response Body: { "id" : 137, "resourceId" : "Karan Kapoor" } Status Code: 201 Stored ResourceID: 137 When Create New ResourceID # social_comments.ResourceGraph.Create_new_resourceid() Then The Resource response status code should be 201 # social_comments.ResourceGraph.the_resource_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer) And The Resource response should contain "id" # social_comments.ResourceGraph.the_resource_response_should_contain(java.lang.String)
testcase.system-err: SLF4J(W): No SLF4J providers were found. SLF4J(W): Defaulting to no-operation (NOP) logger implementation SLF4J(W): See https://www.slf4j.org/codes.html#noProviders for further details.

Get ResourceID Details with ID

Deleting ResourceID Details

@ResourceGraph Scenario: Deleting ResourceID Details # src/test/resources/features/01_resource_graph.feature:40 Delete Response Body:
Delete Status Code: 204 When Delete ResourceID with ID # social_comments.ResourceGraph.delete_ResourceID_with_ID() Then The Resource response status code should be 204 # social_comments.ResourceGraph.the_resource_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer)

testcase.name: Creating ResourceRegistries
testcase.system-out: @ResourceRegistries Scenario: Creating ResourceRegistries # src/test/resources/features/02_resource_registries.feature:7 Given I have a ResourceRegistries # social_comments.ResourceRegistries.i_have_a_resourceregistries() { "resourceGraph": { "id": 137 }, "createdDate": "2025-10-09", "resourceName": "Arjun Kapoor", "label": "Arjun Kapoor", "resourceValue": "Arjun Kapoor" } POST ResourceRegistries Status: 201 POST ResourceRegistries Body: { "id" : 103, "createdDate" : "2025-10-09T14:39:49.550+00:00", "isRemoved" : false, "resourceName" : "Arjun Kapoor", "label" : "Arjun Kapoor", "resourceValue" : "Arjun Kapoor" } Stored ResourceID: 103 When Create a ResourceRegistry using existing ResourceId # social_comments.ResourceRegistries.createResourceRegistryUsingExistingResourceId() Then The ResourceRegistries response should contain "id" # social_comments.ResourceRegistries.the_resource_registries_response_should_contain(java.lang.String) And The ResourceRegistries response status code should be 201 # social_comments.ResourceRegistries.the_resource_registries_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer)

testcase.name: Creating Message
testcase.system-out: @Message Scenario: Creating Message # src/test/resources/features/03_message.feature:7 Given I have a Message # social_comments.Message.i_have_a_message() { "createdDate": "2025-10-20", "messagePrivacy": "USER", "messageType": "DOODLE_TICKLER", "userId": "USR-36462", "hasCustomTemplate": true, "decoratorLayer": "SUCCESS", "hasUserRecipient": false, "hasChildren": false, "isEdited": false, "updatedDate": "2025-10-19", "content": "New security guidelines have been issued — please review them on the company portal.", "hasAttachment": true, "isRemoved": true, "caseId": "CASE-6573-Q4", "rootMessageId":118104, "parentId": 19800, "externalIdentifiers": "EXT-7443", "resourceGraph": { "id": "137" }, "flagStatus": "MEDIUM", "roleName": "Operations Lead", "hasCustomElement": true, "hasReaction": true, "hasCustomTag": true } POST Message Status: 201 POST Message Body: { "id" : 74, "hasCustomTemplate" : true, "decoratorLayer" : "SUCCESS", "hasUserRecipient" : false, "hasChildren" : false, "isEdited" : false, "updatedDate" : "2025-10-19T00:00:00.000+00:00", "content" : "New security guidelines have been issued — please review them on the company portal.", "hasAttachment" : true, "isRemoved" : true, "messageType" : "DOODLE_TICKLER", "messagePrivacy" : "USER", "caseId" : "CASE-6573-Q4", "userId" : "USR-36462", "rootMessageId" : 118104, "parentId" : 19800, "externalIdentifiers" : "EXT-7443", "createdDate" : "2025-10-20T00:00:00.000+00:00", "flagStatus" : "MEDIUM", "roleName" : "Operations Lead", "hasCustomElement" : true, "hasReaction" : true, "hasCustomTag" : true } Stored MessageID: 74 When Create a Message using existing ResourceId # social_comments.Message.create_a_message_using_existing_ResourceId() Then The Message response should contain "id" # social_comments.Message.the_message_response_should_contain(java.lang.String) And The Message response status code should be 201 # social_comments.Message.the_message_response_status_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer)
